Jersey_City.The Hudson School: The Hudson School is a private, nonsectarian, coeducational day school located in Hoboken, in Hudson County, New Jersey, United States, serving students in fifth through twelfth grades. The school has been accredited by the Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Secondary Schools since 1991. It was ranked 26th on the list of the best private high schools in New Jersey by Niche, with an academic score of A+.
